attributes.action: Deselect Yvette Cooper MP for failure to carry out the result of the referendum
attributes.background: Going totally against her pre-election manifesto Yvette Cooper is repeatedly attempting to block brexit. The latest throw of the dice involved removing no deal all together. We must not allow this & it goes against her constituent vote which was 70%-30% in favour of leaving the EU. No deal only!

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because it is not something the UK Government or Parliament is responsible for.

The selection of parliamentary candidates is the responsibility of their political party.
